title: StudioLinkedVST - Platinum Hits 2 [KONTAKT] (Torrent)
description:
Torrent Info:
==============

This torrent contains another torrent, which is not my own, but I did edit it to add some extra trackers.


Torrent contents:
==================

Kontakt Instruments & Midi files


Installation:
==============

None! To use, simply drag & drop either a midi file to your DAW, or a .nki to (cracked) kontakt.


Product Info:
==============

PLATINUM HIT 2
Consist of 7GB of Content
80 Instruments (Brass,808's,Plucks,Lead Synths,Strings,....more)
Tons of Midi Files (Most common Chord Progressions,Drum Patterns,Complex snare rolls)
Formats-Kontakt 5,
Compatible-Mac & PC

The Platinum Hit 2 takes a new approach to sound design. Platinum hit 2 comes with an impressive stock library of instruments. Finally a library has successfully delievered that Big Brass sound that is common in young Jeezy records, Bells like meek mill, Synth pads like drake, and chord progressions like Chris brown.

What is New:
Improved Instrument Sound Quality- in Brass,Keys,Pads,Leads
Midi Files-325 of the hottest chord progressions,drum patterns,melodies,complex hi hats and snare rolls to add to your production.
